Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute near Damen/14th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/14th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Merchandise Mart
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Merchandise Mart due to a mechanical problem on a train. Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Merchandise Mart due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
